typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		latitude as decimal(10,0),
		longitude as decimal(10,0),
		room_type as string,
		price as float,
		minimum_nights as integer,
		number_of_reviews as integer,
		last_review as date,
		reviews_per_month as float,
		calculated_host_listings_count as integer,
		availability_365 as integer,
		name as string,
		host as string,
		neightborhood as string,
		room as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadPostingData
